TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventDescriptorCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type EventDescriptorCollection = class interface ICollection interface IList interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 对象集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是只读的;它不实现添加或移除事件的方法。 is read-only; it does not implement methods that add or remove events. 必须从此类继承以实现这些方法。You must inherit from this class to implement these methods. 使用类中可用的属性, 可以查询集合中有关其内容的信息。Using the properties available in the class, you can query the collection about its contents. 使用 属性可确定集合中的元素数。Use the property to determine the number of elements in the collection. 使用属性按索引号或按名称获取特定属性。Use the property to get a specific property by index number or by name. 你还可以使用方法从集合中获取具有指定名称的事件的说明。You can also use the method to get a description of the event with the specified name from the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在文本框中的按钮上输出所有事件。The following code example prints all the events on a button in a text box. 它要求`button1`在窗`textBox1`体中实例化和。It requires that `button1` and `textBox1` have been instantiated on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic EventDescriptorCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic EventDescriptorCollection Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventDescriptorCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic EventDescriptorCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventDescriptorCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic EventDescriptorCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可用于设置循环访问对象集合的循环限制。The property can be used to set the limits of a loop that iterates through a collection of objects. 如果集合从零开始, 请确保将`Count - 1`用作循环的上限。If the collection is zero-based, be sure to use `Count - 1` as the upper boundary of the loop. > [!NOTE] > 应用于此类的 特性具有以下属性值:。 The attribute applied to this class has the following property value: . 不影响桌面应用程序（通常通过双击图标、键入命令或在浏览器中输入 URL 来启动这些应用程序）。The does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser). 有关详细信息, 请参阅类或[SQL Server 编程和宿主保护特性](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md)。For more information, see the class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来输出附加到`button1`的事件数。The following code example uses the property to print the number of events attached to `button1`. 它要求`button1`在窗`textBox1`体中实例化和。It requires that `button1` and `textBox1` have been instantiated on a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引号从零开始。The index number is zero-based. 因此, 必须从一个特定的数字位置减去1才能访问该数字。Therefore, you must subtract 1 from the numerical position of a particular to access that . 例如, 若要获取第三个, 需要指定。 `myColl[2]`For example, to get the third , you need to specify `myColl[2]`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性在文本框中打印索引号所指定的名称。The following code example uses the property to print the name of the specified by the index number in a text box. 由于索引号从零开始, 因此, 此示例将打印第二个的名称。Because the index number is zero-based, this example prints the name of the second . 它要求`button1`在窗`textBox1`体中实例化和。It requires that `button1` and `textBox1` have been instantiated on a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜索名称时, 属性区分大小写。The property is case-sensitive when searching for names. 也就是说, 名称 "Ename" 和 "Ename" 被视为两个不同的事件。That is, the names "Ename" and "ename" are considered to be two different events. > [!NOTE] > 应用于此类的 特性具有以下属性值:。 The attribute applied to this class has the following property value: . 不影响桌面应用程序（通常通过双击图标、键入命令或在浏览器中输入 URL 来启动这些应用程序）。The does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser). 有关详细信息, 请参阅类或[SQL Server 编程和宿主保护特性](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md)。For more information, see the class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性打印索引指定的组件的类型。The following code example uses the property to print the type of the component for the specified by the index. 它要求`button1`在窗`textBox1`体中实例化和。It requires that `button1` and `textBox1` have been instantiated on a form.
